description:
Hello my name is Paul Gronow I'm a professional Guitar Instructor, living in the UK.

The 'How To Become A Guitar Teacher By Paul Gronow' Course, is specifically designed for new & experienced guitarists who are either teaching guitar or would like to teach guitar, either online or offline.

This course is based on over 20 years of continuous experience as a professional ICT Trainer & Guitar Teacher, in the UK.

Join me as we take a short but comprehensive look at the following topics.

How To Guide

This course will help you to plan, prepare, promote, deliver & assess high quality guitar lessons.

Free Guitar Resource Packs To Help You Teach Guitar Today

Also you'll get your hands on high quality starter packs, that'll give you much of what you'll need to start teaching guitar lessons today.

Who Is This Course For?

So if you are new to guitar or have been playing a while & you want to learn how to teach guitar from someone who is doing it week-in-week-out then read on for further information & I look forward to meeting you inside the Course.

TOPICS

Topics covered inside the 'How To Become A Guitar Teacher By Paul Gronow' Course.

  1. are you a teacher?
  2. how about qualifications?
  3. identifying your niche
  4. knowledge of guitar
  5. identifying your level
  6. the guitar lesson
  7. how much should you charge
  8. your guitar resources
  9. the teaching environment
  10. dealing with accounts
  11. finding students
  12. web presence
  13. final thoughts
  14. resource pack


I look forward to helping you inside this course today...

Regards,

Paul Gronow, BA (Hons) HRM, FAETC, RGT, EWC

How to become a guitar teacher by Paul Gronow
title: How To Become A Guitar Teacher By Paul Gronow
